body:
On Nov 6, 2007, at 5:04 AM, Bernd Zeimetz wrote:


> Lars O. Grobe wrote:
>>> Because unless the campatability link is installed, a large  
>>> number of
>>> existing scenes won't render, and none of the docs will tell you  
>>> why.
>>> Can you imagine something more frustrating to a new user?
>>
>> But that is what I am wondering. The new user does not have existing
>> scenes. And it is trivial to change the scenes that are distributed,
>
> They're patched if you look into the package.


And all the docs are wrong now, including the only published  
reference, and all the e-mail archives.  Does anyone else think this  
is a bit much?


Randolph
___
